article: An old tiger lives in the forest. He doesn't want to look  _  food now. He often tells other animals to  _  him something to eat. It's the  _  turn. He brings him nothing. He says to the tiger, " I can't do that now. There is  _  tiger over there. He is  _  than you. He tells me not to bring you  _  . I am afraid of him." " What? " cries the old tiger. " Show me that tiger. I will  _  to him." " Come with me." says the monkey. He takes the tiger to a big river. " Now look down at the  _  . Do you see the head, the white teeth and the large green  _  of a tiger? Isn't he stronger than you? " " Yes, he is." cries the old tiger, " I will eat him up!  _  these words, the tiger jumps into the river.
